   \"{\": \"}\",\r\n        \"[\": \"]\"\r\n    }\r\n    stack = []\r\n\r\n    for parenthesis in list(s):\r\n        if parenthesis in mappings:\r\n            stack.append(parenthesis)\r\n            continue\r\n        \r\n        if len(stack) > 0 and mappings[stack[-1]] == parenthesis:\r\n            stack.pop()\r\n        else:\r\n            return False\r\n            \r\n\r\n    return
